name: Magdalene
unlock: Have 7 or more Red Heart Containers at one time

name: A Cube of Meat
description: Unlocked a new item. (Also unlocks the Ball of Bandages)

item.name: Cube of Meat
item.description: Creates an orbital familiar. Collecting additional copies gives it the ability to shoot tears, then chase enemies to deal contact damage, then deal even more contact damage.

item.name: Book of Revelations
item.description: Increases the chance of a Devil Room / Angel Room appearing while held. Upon use, gives one  Soul Heart, and replaces the boss of the current floor with a Harbinger if possible.

item.name: Transcendence
item.description: Grants flight.

name: The Nail
unlock: Complete the Boss Rush as  Azazel

item.name: The Nail
item.description: Gives one  Soul Heart. For the current room; +0.7 damage, -0.18 speed, Isaac breaks rocks and deals contact damage. Gives half a  Black Heart. For the current room; +2 damage, -0.18 speed, Isaac breaks rocks and deals contact damage.

item.name: A Quarter
item.description: Gives Isaac 25  coins.

item.name: Dr. Fetus
item.description: Tears are replaced by  Bombs that benefit from bomb-enhancing effects and slide for a fixed time after being fired.

item.name: The Small Rock
item.description: +1 damage, +0.2 tears, -0.2 speed.

item.name: Monstro's Tooth
item.description: A friendly  Monstro jumps on a random enemy, dealing 120 area damage. Targets Isaac if used in a room without enemies.

item.name: Little Chubby
item.description: Spawns a  Charger familiar that charges forward and deals contact damage to any enemies in its path.

item.name: Loki's Horns
item.description: Gives a random chance for projectiles to fire in all 4 cardinal directions.

name: A Bandage
unlock: Make a Super Bandage Girl by picking up 4 copies of Ball of Bandages in one run; see Unlocking Super Meat Boy & Super Bandage Girl

item.name: Super Bandage
item.description: Grants one full Red Heart container and 2  Soul Hearts.

item.name: The Relic
item.description: Spawns a cross familiar that drops a  Soul Heart after clearing enough rooms.

item.name: Sack of Pennies
item.description: Spawns a familiar that drops a  coin every 2 rooms.

item.name: The Book of Sin
item.description: Spawns a random coin, heart, bomb, key, battery, pill or card near Isaac.

item.name: Little Gish
item.description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and fires slowing tears, impeding enemies' speed.

item.name: Little Steven
item.description: Spawns a familiar who follows Isaac around and fires homing tears.

item.name: Little C.H.A.D.
item.description: Spawns a familiar who drops a  Half Red Heart every 3 rooms.

item.name: The Gamekid
item.description: Turns Isaac into a Pac-Man-like creature for 6.5 seconds, granting invulnerability, inflicting fear on all enemies, and has a chance of replenishing a  Half Red Heart every time an enemy is killed.

name: A Halo
unlock: Defeat Mom, Mom's Heart, or It Lives! using The Bible or XV - The Devil?

item.name: The Halo
item.description: Grants one full Red Heart container, +0.3 damage, +0.2 tears, +0.25 range, +0.3 speed, and +0.5 tear falling speed. Grants one full Red Heart container, +0.3 damage, +0.2 tears, +1.5 range, and +0.3 speed. Heals 1 additional  Red Heart.

item.name: Mr. Mega
item.description: +5  Bombs. Increases the size, blast radius, and damage of Isaac's bombs.

item.name: The D6
item.description: Re-rolls all items in the current room into other items, depending on the current room's Item Pool.

item.name: Scissors
item.description: Turns Isaac's head into a stationary familiar for the current room which fires tears automatically.  Isaac's body also shoots a controllable fountain of blood shots for the room.

name: The Parasite
unlock: Pick up any 2 of the following items in a single run: Bob's Rotten Head, Dead Cat, Cricket's Head, and Tammy's Head ( Any 2 items that have the 'dead' item tag)

item.name: The Parasite
item.description: Isaac's tears split in two when they hit something.

name: Mom's Contact
unlock: Obtain three Yes Mother? items in one run

item.name: Mom's Contacts
item.description: Adds a chance to shoot petrifying tears, which stop enemies in place and prevent them from moving or attacking.  +0.25 range.  +1.5 range.

item.name: The Necronomicon
item.description: Deals 40 damage to every enemy in the room.

name: Eve
unlock: Don't pick up any Hearts for 2 floors in a row

item.name: Mom's Knife
item.description: Isaac's tears are replaced by a knife that pierces enemies, can travel through obstacles, and can hurt enemies while Isaac is holding it. Holding down the fire button before firing increases its range and power.

item.name: Razor Blade
item.description: Takes one  Heart of health and grants +1.2 damage for the current room.  Repeated uses in the same room only take half a heart.

item.name: Guardian Angel
item.description: Spawns an orbital familiar that blocks enemy shots, deals 7 damage per tick on contact, and increases the speed of all orbital familiars.

item.name: Bomb Bag
item.description: Spawns a familiar that drops a  Bomb every 3 rooms.

item.name: Demon Baby
item.description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and automatically fires at enemies in its reach.

item.name: Forget Me Now
item.description: Restarts the current floor with a new layout. Isaac loses Forget Me Now, but keeps other items and consumables picked up on the original floor.

item.name: D20
item.description: Rerolls all pickups in the current room.

item.name: Celtic Cross
item.description: Grants a chance to trigger the Book of Shadows effect upon taking damage, creating a shield that nullifies all types of damage for 7 seconds.

item.name: Abel
item.description: Spawns a familiar that mirrors Isaac's movements and shoots in the opposite direction. Spawns a familiar that mirrors Isaac's movements and shoots towards him.

item.name: Sacrificial Dagger
item.description: Spawns a dagger orbital familiar, blocking enemy shots and dealing a high amount of damage to enemies in contact.

item.name: Bloody Lust
item.description: Increases Isaac's damage whenever he takes damage, up to six times. The bonus resets when entering a new floor.

item.name: Blood Rights
item.description: Takes a full heart of health and deals 40 damage to all enemies in the room.  Repeated uses in the same room only take half a heart.

item.name: The Polaroid
item.description: If Isaac has half a red heart or no red hearts after taking damage, he gains a shield that nullifies all types of damage for 5 seconds. Allows entrance into Chest.  Also allows access to Home.

name: Dad's Key
unlock: Pick up both Key Pieces from the Angels in one run

item.name: Dad's Key
item.description: Opens all doors in the current room in almost all circumstances, including doors which require a  Key to open, entrances to Secret Rooms, and the door to  Mega Satan.

name: Blue Candle
unlock: Donate 900 coins to the Donation Machine

item.name: The Candle
item.description: Throws out a flame that damages everything in its path, diminishing in size as it travels.

item.name: Epic Fetus
item.description: Isaac's tears are replaced with guided missiles, like those used by the Doctor's Remote.

item.name: SMB Super Fan
item.description: +1 Red Heart container, +0.3 damage, +0.2 tears, +0.2 speed, +0.5 range, +1 tear falling speed. Fully restores all red hearts. +1 Red Heart container, +0.3 damage, +0.2 tears, +0.2 speed, +2.5 range. Fully restores all red hearts.

name: Counterfeit Coin
unlock: Play either Shell Game or  Hell Game 100 times

item.name: Guppy's Hairball
item.description: Spawns a familiar that loosely follows behind Isaac, which blocks shots can be swung like a flail to damage enemies. Grows bigger by killing enemies.

name: Samson
unlock: Complete 2 floors in a row without taking damage

name: !Platinum God!
unlock: Collect all non-DLC items in the game, and unlock all of the secrets and endings (minus  The Lost and his 6 unlockable items)

name: Isaac's Head
unlock: Complete the Boss Rush as  Isaac

name: The Left Hand
unlock: Defeat Ultra Pride as any character, or ??? as  Judas

item.name: The Negative
item.description: If Isaac has half a red heart or no red hearts after taking damage, all enemies in the room take significant damage. Allows entrance into the Dark Room.  +1 Damage and also allows access to Home.

name: Azazel
unlock: Make 3 Deals with the Devil in one run

name: Lazarus
unlock: Have 4 or more Soul Hearts at one time

name: The Lost
unlock: It's complicated Die in a Sacrifice Room while holding Missing Poster

name: Dead Boy
description: Beat Chest or Dark Room without taking damage.

name: The Real Platinum God
unlock: Collect every non-DLC item, and unlock every secret and ending.

name: The Cellar
unlock: Beat all Basement bosses ( except Baby Plum) (not restricted to beating bosses in The Basement)

name: The Catacombs
unlock: Beat all Caves bosses ( except Bumbino) (not restricted to beating bosses in The Caves)

name: The Necropolis
unlock: Beat all Depths bosses ( except Reap Creep) (not restricted to beating bosses in The Depths)

name: Card Against Humanity
unlock: Complete When Life Gives You Lemons (challenge #12)

item.name: Robo-Baby 2.0
item.description: Spawns a familiar that fires lasers at any enemy in its line of sight and moves based on the direction Isaac is firing tears.

item.name: Death's Touch
item.description: +1.5 damage, -0.3 tears. Tears are replaced with large piercing scythes.

item.name: Tech.5
item.description: Isaac occasionally fires an unlimited range piercing laser alongside his normal tears. The laser can glitch, mimicking the effects of certain items and trinkets.

name: Missing No.
unlock: Complete the Boss Rush as  Lazarus

item.name: Missing No.
item.description: Randomizes all passive items and stats upon pickup and at the start of each succeeding floor.

item.name: Isaac's Tears
item.description: Fires 8 tears around Isaac, which retain the damage, range, shot speed, and special tear effects of his tears. Each tear shot by Isaac increases item charge by one.  Tears from this item have a +5 flat damage bonus.

item.name: Guillotine
item.description: Isaac's head becomes an orbital familiar that blocks shots and deals contact damage. Tears are still fired from the rotating head.  +1 damage, -1 tear delay.  +1 damage, +0.5 fire rate.

name: Judas' Shadow
unlock: Complete the Boss Rush as  Judas

item.name: Judas' Shadow
item.description: Upon death, respawns Isaac as  Dark Judas with two  Black Hearts in the previous room.

name: Maggy's Bow
unlock: Complete the Boss Rush as  Magdalene

item.name: Maggy's Bow
item.description: Gives one Red Heart Container and doubles the healing provided by  Red Hearts.  Also heals 1 Red Heart when obtained.

name: Cain's Other Eye
unlock: Complete the Boss Rush as  Cain

item.name: Cain's Other Eye
item.description: Spawns a familiar that slowly floats around the room on a zig-zag pattern and shoots normal tears in the same direction as Isaac. Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and fires tears in random cardinal directions that copy Isaac's tears and tear effects and scale with damage.

name: Eve's Mascara
unlock: Complete the Boss Rush as  Eve

item.name: Eve's Mascara
item.description: Doubles damage, halves tears stat, and greatly reduces shot speed.  Doubles damage, 0.66x tears multiplier, and greatly reduces shot speed.

item.name: Fate
item.description: Grants flight and one  Eternal Heart.

item.name: ???'s Only Friend
item.description: Spawns a controllable familiar that deals 37.5 damage per second on touch. It can be moved using the shooting directional keys

name: Samson's Chains
unlock: Complete the Boss Rush as  Samson

item.name: Samson's Chains
item.description: Attaches a ball and chain to Isaac that pulls behind him that damages enemies, blocks shots, and destroys most Obstacles.

item.name: Lazarus' Rags
item.description: Upon dying, resurrect as  Lazarus Risen in the current room with one Red Heart container and Anemic. Upon dying, resurrect as  Lazarus Risen in the current room with one less Red Heart container, Anemic, and +0.5 Damage. Transform into  Lazarus when reaching the next floor.

item.name: Pandora's Box
item.description: Spawns specific pickups or items depending on the floor it is used on. Disappears after use.

item.name: Blank Card
item.description: Copies the effect of the card or rune currently held by Isaac. Copies the effect of the card currently held by Isaac. The charge time is based on the power of the card.

item.name: Book of Secrets
item.description: Gives the effect of Treasure Map, The Compass, or Blue Map for the duration of the current floor.  If all effects are active,  X-Ray Vision is provided for the floor instead. Highlights any Tinted Rocks and rocks with Crawl Space in the room.

item.name: Mystery Sack
item.description: Spawns a familiar that drops a Heart, coin,  Bomb, or  Key every 5-6 rooms.

name: Undefined
unlock: Complete the Boss Rush as  Eden

item.name: Undefined
item.description: Teleports Isaac to the Secret Room, Super Secret Room, Treasure Room, or I AM ERROR.

item.name: Satanic Bible
item.description: Gives one  Black Heart.  Replaces the boss room item on the current floor with a Devil Deal.

item.name: Abaddon
item.description: +1.5 damage, +0.2 speed. Removes all Red Heart containers, grants six  Black Hearts, and adds a chance to shoot fear tears. +1.5 damage, +0.2 speed. Grants two  Black Hearts, converts all Red Heart Containers into Black Hearts, and adds a chance to shoot fear tears.

item.name: Isaac's Heart
item.description: Isaac himself is now immune to all damage, and a heart familiar follows him. If the heart is hurt, Isaac is hurt.  The heart charges up as Isaac shoots, firing 8 blood shots, knocking back enemies, and leaving a puddle of creep when released.

item.name: The Mind
item.description: Reveals the entire map, including all special rooms and Secret Rooms.

item.name: The Body
item.description: Adds 3 Red Heart Containers.

name: The Soul
unlock: Defeat The Lamb as  The Lost

item.name: The Soul
item.description: Grants two  Soul Hearts. Isaac gains a pulsing aura that repels enemies and projectiles.

name: The D100
unlock: Complete the Boss Rush as  The Lost

item.name: D100
item.description: Combines the effects of D4, The D6, and D20. Combines the effects of D1, D4, The D6, D7, D8, D10, D12, and D20.

name: Blue Map
unlock: Donate 10 Coins to the Donation Machine

item.name: Blue Map
item.description: Reveals the locations of Secret Rooms and Super Secret Rooms on the map.

name: There's Options
unlock: Donate 50 Coins to the Donation Machine

item.name: There's Options
item.description: Two items appear after defeating a Boss. Only one can be taken; the other will disappear.

name: Black Candle
unlock: Donate 150 Coins to the Donation Machine

item.name: Black Candle
item.description: Prevents curses. Grants one  Black Heart. Increases the chance for a Devil Room or Angel Room to appear.

name: Red Candle
unlock: Donate 400 Coins to the Donation Machine

item.name: Red Candle
item.description: Throws out a flame that damages everything in its path, diminishing in size as it hits enemies or blocks shots.

name: Stop Watch
unlock: Donate 999 Coins to the Donation Machine

item.name: Stop Watch
item.description: +0.3 speed. Automatically inflicts slow to all enemies in every room.+0.3 speed. Upon taking damage, inflicts slow to all enemies for the current room.+0.3 speed. Slows all enemies in every room to 80% speed.

item.name: Wire Coat Hanger
item.description: +0.7 tears.

item.name: Ipecac
item.description: Replaces tears with explosive and poisoning projectiles fired in an arc from the mouth.

item.name: Experimental Treatment
item.description: Randomly increases and decreases some of Isaac's stats. Increases four random stats and decreases the other two.

item.name: Head of Krampus
item.description: Fires a powerful Brimstone beam in four cardinal directions, much like  Krampus shoots. Fires a powerful Brimstone beam in four cardinal directions, much like  Krampus shoots, with a 50% chance to rotate all beams around Isaac 90 degrees.

name: Super Meat Boy
description: Built him out of meat cubes.
unlock: Make a Super Meat Boy by picking up 4 copies of Cube of Meat in one run; see Unlocking Super Meat Boy & Super Bandage Girl

item.name: Butter Bean
item.description: Isaac farts and knocks back nearby enemies  and projectiles.  Enemies pushed into walls or obstacles take 12 damage.

name: Little Baggy
unlock: Pick up any 2 of the following items in a single run: Roid Rage, The Virus, Growth Hormones, Experimental Treatment, and Speed Ball ( Any 2 items that have the 'syringe' item tag)

item.name: Little Baggy
item.description: Isaac can hold 2 pills at once and all cards and runes are replaced by pills.

name: Blood Bag
unlock: Use the Blood Donation Machine 30 times

item.name: Blood Bag
item.description: Grants one filled Red Heart container, restores 4  Red Hearts, and increases speed by 0.3.

item.name: D4
item.description: Rerolls all of Isaac's passive items.

item.name: Rubber Cement
item.description: Tears bounce off walls, enemies, and environmental objects.

name: Store Upgrade lv.1
unlock: Donate 20 Coins to the Donation Machine

name: Store Upgrade lv.2
unlock: Donate 100 Coins to the Donation Machine

name: Store Upgrade lv.3
unlock: Donate 200 Coins to the Donation Machine

name: Store Upgrade lv.4
unlock: Donate 600 Coins to the Donation Machine

name: Godhead
unlock: Earn all  5 /  9 /  10 /  12 Completion Marks on Hard mode as  The Lost

item.name: Godhead
item.description: Grants homing tears with a damaging halo. +0.5 Damage, -0.3 Tears -0.3 Shot Speed, +0.8 Tear Falling Speed, and +1.2 Range. Grants homing tears with a damaging halo. +0.5 Damage, -0.3 Tears, and -0.3 Shot Speed.

name: Darkness Falls
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart 11 times and unlock  Eve Defeat Mom's Heart 11 times and defeat ??? as  Eve

name: The Tank
unlock: Have 7 or more Red Heart Containers at one time

name: Suicide King
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart 11 times and unlock  Lazarus

name: Cursed!
unlock: Have 7 or more Red Heart Containers at one time

name: Glass Cannon
unlock: Beat The Family Man (challenge #19), defeat Lokii, and unlock  Judas

name: The Family Man
unlock: Pick up both Key Pieces from the Angels in one run

name: Lost Baby
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart on Hard mode as  Isaac

name: Cute Baby
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart on Hard mode as  Magdalene

name: Crow Baby
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart on Hard mode as  Eve

name: Shadow Baby
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart on Hard mode as  Judas

name: Glass Baby
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart on Hard mode as  Cain

name: Wrapped Baby
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart on Hard mode as  Azazel Defeat Mom's Heart on Hard mode as  Lazarus

name: Begotten Baby
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart on Hard mode as  Lazarus Defeat Mom's Heart on Hard mode as  Azazel

name: Dead Baby
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart on Hard mode as  ???

name: -0- Baby
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart on Hard mode as  The Lost

name: Glitch Baby
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart on Hard mode as  Eden

name: Fighting Baby
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart on Hard mode as  Samson

name: Lord of the Flies
description: You became Lord of the Flies.

item.name: Farting Baby
item.description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and blocks enemy shots. If a shot hits Farting Baby, it has a chance to fart, which charms, poisons, or knocks back nearby enemies.

item.name: Purity
item.description: Boosts one of Isaac's stats depending on the color of the aura around him. The aura disappears upon taking damage and reappears with a random color upon entering a new room. Red boosts damage, blue boosts tears, yellow boosts speed, and orange boosts range.

item.name: D12
item.description: Re-rolls all Rocks and Metal Blocks in the current room into other random obstacles. Re-rolls most types of Obstacles in the current room into other random obstacles.

item.name: Betrayal
item.description: Charms all enemies in the room when Isaac takes damage. Enemies are able to damage each other. If an enemy is damaged by another enemy, they will attack that enemy instead of Isaac.

item.name: Fate's Reward
item.description: A blue head familiar that will follow Isaac and fire tears copying his tear effects and damage.

item.name: Athame
item.description: When Isaac takes damage, a damaging black ring briefly appears around him. This ring can cause enemies to drop  Black Hearts. After Isaac kills an enemy, adds a luck-based chance to spawn a damaging black ring around them.

item.name: Maw Of The Void
item.description: Isaac can charge and unleash a black ring that rapidly deals damage around him.  The ring can cause enemies to drop  Black Hearts. +1 damage.

item.name: Empty Vessel
item.description: Grants two  Black Hearts. While Isaac has no red hearts, grants flight and periodically grants an invincibility shield for a few seconds.

item.name: Eden's Blessing
item.description: +0.7 tears up. Grants a random item at the start of the next run.

item.name: Sworn Protector
item.description: Spawns an orbital familiar which does 105 damage per second and attracts and blocks enemy shots. Upon blocking 10 shots in a room, it drops an  Eternal Heart.

item.name: Incubus
item.description: Spawns a demonic familiar that shoots tears identical to Isaac's in terms of damage, tears, and tear effects.

item.name: Lil Chest
item.description: Spawns a chest familiar that spawns a random pickup (25% chance) or trinket (10% chance) upon clearing a room.

item.name: Censer
item.description: Spawns a familiar which creates a circular aura that slows down enemies and enemy shots inside.

item.name: Evil Eye
item.description: Adds a chance to fire a slow-moving eye that fires tears in the same direction as Isaac. The eye is destroyed when it hits an enemy or obstacle.

item.name: My Shadow
item.description: Inflicts fear on all enemies in the room upon taking damage and spawns black friendly  Chargers that attack enemies.Spawns a shadow familiar that closely follows behind Isaac. It spawns a black friendly  Charger whenever an enemy touches it.

item.name: Lusty Blood
item.description: Isaac's damage increases for the current room each time he kills an enemy.

item.name: Key Bum
item.description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and collects  Keys for himself, giving random  Chests in return.

item.name: GB Bug
item.description: Spawns a familiar that bounces diagonally around the room, applying a random status effect to enemies it hits and has a chance to re-roll pickups it passes over. Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac. Double tapping the fire button launches it forward, causing it to reroll the first monster or pickup it hits.

name: Zodiac
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greed as  The Lost

item.name: Zodiac
item.description: Gives Isaac a random zodiac item effect that changes every floor.

item.name: Box of Friends
item.description: Duplicates all of Isaac's familiars for the current room. If Isaac has no familiars, spawns a Demon Baby for the room instead.

name: White Baby
unlock: Defeat Mega Satan as  The Lost

item.name: Rune Bag
item.description: Spawns a familiar that drops a random rune after clearing enough rooms.

item.name: Cambion Conception
item.description: After taking damage a certain amount of times, a permanent demonic familiar spawns.

item.name: Serpent's Kiss
item.description: Tears have a chance to apply a poison effect to enemies. Isaac poisons enemies on contact. Poisoned enemies have a chance to drop a  Black Heart when killed.

item.name: Succubus
item.description: Spawns a flying familiar that bounces around the room with a black aura, dealing rapid damage to any enemies inside it. While standing in the aura, Isaac gains a 1.5 tear damage multiplier.

name: Immaculate Conception
unlock: Complete the Boss Rush as  Lilith

item.name: Immaculate Conception
item.description: Upon picking up a certain amount of health, spawn a permanent angelic familiar.

name: Goat Head Baby
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart on Hard mode as  Lilith

name: Get out of Jail Free Card

item.name: D8
item.description: Re-rolls Isaac's damage, tears, range, and speed.

name: Kidney Stone
unlock: Complete The Guardian (challenge #30) Complete Onan's Streak (challenge #29)

item.name: Kidney Stone
item.description: Isaac is occasionally forced to stop firing and charge an attack that launches a massive piercing, spectral kidney stone and a barrage of tears.  -0.2 speed, decreases range.

name: Blank Rune
unlock: Complete Onan's Streak (challenge #29) Complete The Guardian (challenge #30)

Unlock all secrets and endings, and collect every item in the game  Unlock as many of the previously mentioned things as there were in Afterbirth (Ex: Unlocking items that were not in Afterbirth, like Red Key, count towards this achievement, meaning you do not need to unlock items like Mega Blast to gain this achievement)

item.name: Deep Pockets
item.description: Allows Isaac to carry two cards or pills (or a combination of both) at the same time. Increases the coin cap to 999. If a room would otherwise yield no reward, 1-3 coins will spawn.

unlock: Complete the Boss Rush as  Keeper

unlock: Donate 14 Coins to the Greed Donation Machine

item.name: Wooden Nickel
item.description: Has a roughly 50% chance to drop a penny, nickel or dime, and a roughly 50% chance to do nothing.

unlock: Defeat Isaac as  Cain and destroy 10 Tinted Rocks

name: Generosity
description: If only everyone was as generous as you are...

name: Mega
unlock: Defeat Mega Satan as every character ( except Tainted characters)

item.name: Mega Blast
item.description: Isaac fires a giant laser for approximately 15 seconds. This laser deals massive damage, pushes Isaac backwards, and persists between rooms and floors.

name: Backasswards
unlock: Defeat ??? or The Lamb Defeat Mega Satan and unlock The Negative

name: Ultra Hard
unlock: Defeat ??? or The Lamb. Possession of The Polaroid / The Negative is required, barring getting to Dark Room through a Sacrifice Room. Defeat Mega Satan and unlock The Negative

item.name: D infinity
item.description: Grants a random die item that changes each use. Acts as any die item, and can by cycled by pressing the drop key.

item.name: Eucharist
item.description: An Angel Room will always spawn after every boss fight, excluding the first floor and floors after Chapter 4.

item.name: Shade
item.description: Spawns a shadow familiar that follows Isaac's movements on a 1 second delay and deals contact damage to enemies. After dealing enough damage, it is absorbed by Isaac and spawns friendly  Chargers.

item.name: King Baby
item.description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and makes other familiars follow it. While firing tears, other familiars stop moving.

item.name: Dull Razor
item.description: Hurts Isaac without depleting health, activating any items that trigger upon taking damage.

item.name: Eden's Soul
item.description: Spawns two item pedestals then is consumed. Begins with no charges.

item.name: Dark Prince's Crown
item.description: When at exactly one  Red Heart, +0.75 tears, +1.5 range, and +0.2 shot speed. When at exactly one  Red Heart, +2 fire rate, +1.5 range, and +0.2 shot speed.

item.name: Compound Fracture
item.description: Increases Range. Tears turn into bones, which shatter into 1-3 bone shards upon hitting an enemy or obstacle.

item.name: Euthanasia
item.description: Adds a luck-based chance to fire needles that instantly kill basic enemies and deal triple damage to bosses. If a needle kills an enemy, it bursts into more tears/needles.

item.name: Crooked Penny
item.description: Spawns a penny and has a 50% chance to double all items and pickups in the room. If the effect fails, the items and pickups disappear.

item.name: Void
item.description: Consumes all pedestal items in the room. Active items will have their effects added to Void, and passive items will grant random stat upgrades.

item.name: D1
item.description: Duplicates a random pickup in the room.  The new pickup may be different than the original (i.e. a different card, etc).

item.name: Glyph of Balance
item.description: Grants 2  Soul Hearts and modifies drops from Champion monsters based on certain conditions.  Also modifies room clear drops.

item.name: Sack of Sacks
item.description: Spawns a familiar that drops a  Grab Bag every 5-6 rooms cleared.

item.name: Eye of Belial
item.description: Grants piercing tears. After piercing one enemy, tears start homing and deal double damage.

item.name: Metronome
item.description: Grants a random item effect for the current room.

item.name: Plan C
item.description: Kills all enemies in the room, then kills Isaac three seconds later.

item.name: Duality
item.description: Whenever a Devil Room or Angel Room would spawn after defeating a boss, both rooms spawn. Only one can be entered.

name: Dad's Lost Coin
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greedier as  The Lost

item.name: Dad's Lost Coin
item.description: +1.5 range, +1 tear falling speed. Drops a Lucky Penny.+2.5 range. Drops a Lucky Penny.

item.name: Eye of Greed
item.description: Every 20 tears, Isaac loses 1  Penny and shoots an additional gold tear that petrifies enemies and turns them into gold. Any enemy killed while in this state will drop coins.

name: Locust of Conquest
unlock: Complete the Boss Rush as  Apollyon

item.name: Hushy
item.description: Spawns a  Hush familiar that bounces diagonally around the room and deals contact damage. While firing tears, it stops moving.

item.name: Brown Nugget
item.description: Spawns a stationary fly turret that lasts for the current room and fires tears at nearby enemies.

name: Smelter
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart or It Lives! on Hard mode as  Apollyon

item.name: Smelter
item.description: Consumes Isaac's currently held trinket and applies its effect permanently.

name: Apollyon Baby
unlock: Earn all Hard mode Completion Marks as  Apollyon

name: Once More with Feeling!
unlock: Complete a Victory Lap by defeating The Lamb

name: 5 Nights at Mom's
unlock: Get a 5-win streak, using a different character each time ( this number can be reduced to 3, see the notes section)

name: Sin collector
unlock: Collect every entry in the Bestiary (bugged v190 - Mobs that don't exist in the bestiary are being counted. This allows Sin Collector to be unlocked without a complete bestiary)

name: Dedication
unlock: Participate in 31 Daily Challenges (they don't have to be consecutive; it will still count if Isaac dies in the first room)

name: ZIP!
unlock: Defeat The Lamb in under 20 minutes

name: It's the Key
unlock: Defeat The Lamb without taking Hearts, Coins, or Bombs through the entire run. Letting certain familiars (e.g. Bum Friend, Dark Bum, Bumbo or Lil Portal) or bosses (e.g. Bumbino) pick up the consumables fails this condition as well.

name: Mr. Resetter!
unlock: Reset 7 times in a rowSwitchPS4 Get a minus 10-win streak

name: Living on the edge
unlock: Complete a Chapter (floors I and II) after Basement, start-to-finish, with only half a Heart total (can use  The Lost)

name: U Broke It!
unlock: Obtain 50 items in a run (duplicate passive items/familiars count towards the total, e.g., multiple Breakfast)

item.name: Greed's Gullet
item.description: Grants a Red Heart container for every 25  Coins Isaac has.

name: The Marathon
unlock: Get a 5-win streak in the Daily Challenges (they don't have to be consecutive days, only the runs you play are counted)

name: RERUN
unlock: Complete 3 Victory Laps by defeating The Lamb

item.name: Delirious
item.description: Spawns  Delirium as a random friendly boss that fights for Isaac.

unlock: Collect every item in the game, unlock all secrets and endings, and complete the Bestiary

name: Greedier!
unlock: Donate 500 Coins to the Greed Donation Machine

item.name: Black Hole
item.description: Throws a black hole on the ground which sucks in and damages enemies and destroys nearby obstacles.

item.name: Mystery Gift
item.description: Spawns a random item from the current room's item pool, with a chance to spawn A Lump of Coal or The Poop instead.

item.name: Sprinkler
item.description: Creates a stationary sprinkler for the current room that rotates and fires tears in 8 directions. The tears copy Isaac's stats and most tear effects.

item.name: Angry Fly
item.description: Spawns a fly familiar that orbits around a random enemy and deals 30 damage per second to enemies it comes in contact with.

item.name: Bozo
item.description: +0.1 flat damage, grants a  Soul Heart. Enemies can randomly become briefly charmed or feared. Taking damage has a chance to spawn a  Rainbow Poop.

name: Broken Modem
unlock: Complete 7 Daily Challenges (by touching the trophy at the end)

item.name: Broken Modem
item.description: Enemies, enemy shots, tears, and pickups will briefly freeze in place at random intervals. The reward from clearing a room will sometimes be duplicated.

name: Buddy in a Box
unlock: Pick up 5 familiars in a single run

item.name: Buddy in a Box
item.description: Spawns a familiar with a random tear effect. The familiar is randomized at the start of each floor.

item.name: Fast Bombs
item.description: +7  Bombs. Removes the delay between bomb placements, allowing them to be placed rapidly.  Bombs will no longer knock each other away.

item.name: Lil Delirium
item.description: Grants a familiar that transforms into another random familiar every 10 seconds.

name: Butter!
unlock: Complete 2 Victory Laps by defeating The Lamb

name: Huge Growth
unlock: Increase in size 5 times in a single run via Magic Mushroom, "One makes you larger" pills, XI - Strength, etc.

name: Era Walk
unlock: Add both the Broken Watch and the Stop Watch to your collection

name: Coupon
unlock: Purchase anything from Shops, Devil Rooms, and/or Black Markets 50 times

item.name: Coupon
item.description: While held, guarantees one item in every Shop will be on sale. On use, makes a random item in the current room free.

item.name: Telekinesis
item.description: Any enemy shots that come near Isaac for the next three seconds are held in place then fired back.

name: Moving Box
unlock: Use Pandora's Box in Dark Room

item.name: Moving Box
item.description: If the box is empty, picks up items and pickups in a room and stores them. If the box is not empty, places all stored items and pickups in the current room.  Can carry up to 10 items or pickups at once.

name: Jumper Cables
unlock: Pick up any 2 of the following items/trinkets in a single run: 9 Volt, The Battery, Car Battery, AAA Battery, and Watch Battery ( Any 2 items that have the 'battery' item tag)

item.name: Jumper Cables
item.description: Grants an active item charge every 15 enemies killed.

item.name: Leprosy
item.description: Taking damage grants a body part orbital that blocks shots and deals contact damage, up to a maximum of three. The body parts are destroyed after blocking enough damage.

name: Technology Zero
unlock: Pick up any 2 technology items in a single run ( Any 2 items that have the 'tech' item tag)

item.name: Technology Zero
item.description: Connects Isaac's tears with electricity that can damage enemies.

name: Filigree Feather
unlock: Acquire both Key Piece 1 and Key Piece 2

item.name: Mr. ME!
item.description: Summons a controllable ghost that can perform various tasks depending on what it targets.

item.name: 7 Seals
item.description: Spawns a random Harbinger familiar that changes every 10 seconds. Harbingers have different behaviors and spawn themed Locusts.

item.name: Angelic Prism
item.description: Spawns an orbital familiar with a large orbital radius. Tears that pass through the prism split into four multi-colored tears.

item.name: Pop!
item.description: Replaces Isaac's tears with eyeballs that can bounce off of each other. The eyeballs are not limited by range, and will instead dissipate when they stop moving or when hitting an enemy or obstacle.

name: Door Stop
unlock: Blow up doors and Secret Room walls 50 times

item.name: Death's List
item.description: Grants a pickup or stat upgrade if all enemies in a room are killed in the order they are marked.

item.name: Haemolacria
item.description: Tears are now fired in an arc. Upon hitting the floor, an obstacle, or an enemy, they burst into many smaller tears in all directions. Increases tear delay.

name: Lachryphagy
unlock: Collect 10 "Tears Up" items or pills in one run

item.name: Lachryphagy
item.description: Isaac's tears decelerate as they travel. Upon stopping or hitting an obstacle, they burst into 8 tears in all directions. Tears can be fired into other tears to feed them, increasing their damage.

item.name: Schoolbag
item.description: Allows Isaac to hold two active items.

item.name: Trisagion
item.description: Tears are replaced with piercing white blasts of light that deal less damage but can damage the same enemy multiple times.

name: Extension Cord
unlock: Have The Battery, 9 Volt, and Car Battery in Isaac's collection

item.name: Flat Stone
item.description: Tears bounce off the floor, creating splashes. Splashes deal 25% of Isaac's tear damage to all enemies in a small area.

item.name: Sacrificial Altar
item.description: Sacrifices up to 2 familiars and spawns an item for each familiar sacrificed. Converts all friendly spiders and flies into coins.

name: Lil Spewer
unlock: Have Isaac die to his own explosion from Ipecac, Bob's Rotten Head, or a Horf! pill

item.name: Lil Spewer
item.description: Drops a random pill, and spawns a familiar that charges up and fires creep. Using pills changes the creep type.

item.name: Blanket
item.description: Grants one  Soul Heart. Upon entering a boss room, grants a shield that blocks one hit, then disappears.

name: Marbles
unlock: Use 5 Gulp! pills in one run (Placebo uses count)

item.name: Marbles
item.description: Spawns 3 random trinkets. Taking damage has a 5% chance to swallow Isaac's currently held trinket, gaining its effect permanently.

name: Mystery Egg
unlock: Spawn three charmed enemies in the same room

item.name: Mystery Egg
item.description: Spawns an egg familiar, which hatches a random friendly monster when Isaac is hurt once per room. The power of the monster improves for each consecutive room cleared without taking damage.

name: Rotten Penny
unlock: Have 20 Blue Flies at the same time

name: Baby-Bender
unlock: Use I - The Magician or Telepathy For Dummies while already having homing tears

name: Marrow
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart or It Lives! on Hard mode as  The Forgotten

item.name: Marrow
item.description: Grants one  Bone Heart and spawns three  Red Hearts.

item.name: Slipped Rib
item.description: Spawns a bone familiar that circles around Isaac and reflects enemy shots.

item.name: Pointy Rib
item.description: Spawns a bone familiar that hovers back and forth in front of Isaac, dealing damage equal to Isaac's damage.

item.name: Jaw Bone
item.description: Spawns a familiar that flies through the room while firing, dealing a flat 7 contact damage to enemies and retrieving pickups.

name: Brittle Bones
unlock: Defeat The Lamb as  The Forgotten

item.name: Brittle Bones
item.description: Replaces all  Red Heart Containers with 6 empty  Bone Hearts.  Upon losing a Bone Heart, Isaac fires bones in 8 directions and permanently gains a tears up.  Upon losing a Bone Heart, Isaac fires bones in 8 directions and permanently gains a fire rate up.

name: Divorce Papers
unlock: Complete the Boss Rush as  The Forgotten

item.name: Divorce Papers
item.description: Grants one  Bone Heart, +0.7 tears, spawns a Mysterious Paper.

item.name: Hallowed Ground
item.description: Spawns a white poop familiar, which turns into a  White Poop when Isaac is hurt. White poop has an aura that increases tear fire rate and can block enemy shots.  The aura also increases damage by 20% and gives homing.

name: Finger Bone
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greed as  The Forgotten

name: Dad's Ring
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greedier as  The Forgotten

item.name: Dad's Ring
item.description: Creates a ring of light around Isaac that petrifies enemies in contact.

item.name: Book of the Dead
item.description: Creates a friendly  Bony,  Black Bony, or an orbital bone for each enemy killed in the current room.Creates a friendly  Bony,  Black Bony,  Bone Fly,  Revenant, or an orbital bone for each enemy killed in the current room.

name: Bone Baby
unlock: Earn all Hard mode Completion Marks as  The Forgotten

name: Bound Baby
unlock: Defeat Mega Satan as  The Forgotten

name: Bethany
description: Beat Hard mode as Lazarus without losing a life
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart/It Lives! on hard mode as  Lazarus, without dying at all

name: Jacob and Esau
description: You are just like your father...

name: The Planetarium
unlock: Collect any 3 items with the 'stars' item tag in a single run

name: Forgotten Lullaby
description: Get that song out of her head.
unlock: Blow up The Siren's skull after defeating her

item.name: Fruity Plum
item.description: Gives Isaac a miniature  Baby Plum familiar that propels itself diagonally around the room, firing tears behind itself as it travels.

name: Plum Flute
unlock: Allow Baby Plum to escape instead of defeating her

item.name: Plum Flute
item.description: Summons the boss  Baby Plum to fight for Isaac in the current room.

name: Rotten Heart
unlock: Enter Corpse for the first time

name: Ashpit
description: Defeat all bosses in the Mines.

name: Gehenna
description: Defeat all bosses in the Mausoleum.

item.name: Red Key
item.description: Creates a Red Room adjacent to a viable wall, indicated by the outline of a door. These rooms have a 10% chance to be a special room.

name: Wisp Baby
description: Beat the game in Hard mode with Bethany.
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart or It Lives! on Hard mode as  Bethany

item.name: Book of Virtues
item.description: Spawns a destroyable orbiting wisp familiar that fires tears and deals contact damage. Also acts as a passive item that causes other active items to spawn themed wisps.

item.name: Urn of Souls
item.description: Spews a stream of damaging flame. Gains Soul Charges each time an enemy dies, which are used to fuel the urn.

name: Alabaster Box
description: Complete the Dark Room with Bethany.

item.name: Alabaster Box
item.description: Spawns three  Soul Hearts and two Angel Room items and is consumed. Starts with no charges, and can only be charged by picking up 6 Soul Hearts.

name: Beth's Faith
unlock: Complete the Boss Rush as  Bethany

item.name: Soul Locket
item.description: Gives Isaac a permanent stat boost whenever he picks up a  Soul Heart.

item.name: Divine Intervention
item.description: Double tapping a fire key creates a shield that pushes away enemies and reflects enemy projectiles and lasers.

item.name: Vade Retro
item.description: While held, enemies leave behind ghosts on death. Stronger enemies leave bigger ghosts. Using the item causes the ghosts to explode and damage nearby enemies, and instantly kills all ghost enemies with less than 50% HP.

item.name: Star of Bethlehem
item.description: Spawns a star familiar that slowly travels towards the Boss Room, giving an aura that increases damage and tears and grants homing tears.

name: Hope Baby
description: Beat everything in Hard mode with Bethany.
unlock: Earn all Hard mode Completion Marks as  Bethany

name: Double Baby
description: Beat the game in Hard mode with Jacob and Esau.
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart or It Lives! on Hard mode as  Jacob and Esau

name: The Stairway
description: Complete the Cathedral with Jacob and Esau.
unlock: Defeat Isaac as  Jacob and Esau

item.name: The Stairway
item.description: Generates a ladder at the start of every floor that leads to a unique Angel Room shop.

name: Red Stew
description: Complete Sheol with Jacob and Esau.
unlock: Defeat Satan as  Jacob and Esau

item.name: Red Stew
item.description: Refills all heart containers. Grants an enormous damage boost that wears off over time.

name: Birthright
description: Complete the Chest with Jacob and Esau.

item.name: Birthright
item.description: Grants a character-specific effect that enhances their special abilities.

name: Damocles
description: Complete the Dark Room with Jacob and Esau.
unlock: Defeat The Lamb as  Jacob and Esau

item.name: Damocles
item.description: Spawns a sword above Isaac's head, which doubles all item pedestals. After Isaac takes damage, the sword can randomly fall at any point, instantly killing him.

name: Rock Bottom
description: Complete Boss Rush with Jacob and Esau.
unlock: Complete Boss Rush as  Jacob and Esau

item.name: Rock Bottom
item.description: Locks Isaac's attributes to their highest values reached.

name: Inner Child
description: Beat Greed mode with Jacob and Esau.
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greed as  Jacob and Esau

item.name: Inner Child
item.description: Upon death, Isaac respawns in the current room with half of a  Red Heart, a massive size down, and +0.2 Speed.

name: Vanishing Twin
unlock: Defeat Hush as  Jacob and Esau

item.name: Vanishing Twin
item.description: Spawns a familiar that becomes a weaker clone of the floor's boss when entering the Boss Room. Defeating it drops an extra item.

name: Genesis
description: Beat Greedier mode with Jacob and Esau.
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greedier as  Jacob and Esau

item.name: Genesis
item.description: Removes all of Isaac's items and pickups and takes him to a unique Bedroom with some pickups and  Chests and a trapdoor to the next floor. For every item Isaac lost, he gets to take an item from a set of three.

name: Suplex!
description: Complete the Void with Jacob and Esau.
unlock: Defeat Delirium as  Jacob and Esau

item.name: Suplex!
item.description: Isaac dashes forward and picks up the first enemy hit. After a moment, he slams them into the ground to deal damage and create a circular rock wave.

name: Solomon's Baby
description: Beat everything in Hard mode with Jacob and Esau.
unlock: Earn all Hard mode Completion Marks as  Jacob and Esau

name: Illusion Baby
description: Defeat Mega Satan with Jacob and Esau.
unlock: Defeat Mega Satan as  Jacob and Esau

item.name: Meat Cleaver
item.description: Splits all enemies in the room into two smaller versions of themselves with much less health.

name: Options?
description: Complete the final chapter with Isaac.

item.name: Options?
item.description: If a room gives a reward when cleared, there will be two different rewards to chose from. Taking one causes the other to disappear.

item.name: Yuck Heart
item.description: Gives Isaac a  Rotten Heart.

name: Candy Heart
description: Complete the final chapter with Magdalene.

item.name: Candy Heart
item.description: Gives Isaac a permanent stat boost whenever he heals with  Red Heart pickups.

item.name: Guppy's Eye
item.description: Shows the contents of  Chests,  Fire Places,  Grab Bags, and  Shopkeepers before they're opened/destroyed.

name: A Pound of Flesh
description: Complete the final chapter with Cain.

item.name: A Pound of Flesh
item.description: Devil deals now cost  Coins, Shop items now cost health, and consumables in shops are free but surrounded by spikes.

item.name: Akeldama
item.description: While in an uncleared room, Isaac forms a trail of bloody tears that drags behind him, bursting and dealing damage upon contact with enemies.

name: Redemption
description: Complete the final chapter with Judas.

item.name: Redemption
item.description: If Isaac enters a Devil Room but leaves without taking/opening anything in it, he gets +1 Damage and a  Soul Heart at the start of the next floor.

item.name: Eternal D6
item.description: Rerolls all items in the room. Each item has a 25% chance to disappear instead.

item.name: Montezuma's Revenge
item.description: While firing, Isaac charges up a short-ranged Brimstone-like diarrhea beam that shoots behind him.

item.name: Bird Cage
item.description: The first time Isaac takes damage in a room, a familiar leaps on an enemy, dealing damage and releasing a rock wave. For the rest of the room, it chases enemies similar to Dead Bird.

name: Cracked Orb
description: Complete the final chapter with Eve.

item.name: Cracked Orb
item.description: Unlocks doors and reveals a random room on the map when Isaac takes damage.

item.name: Bloody Gust
item.description: The first 6 times Isaac takes damage on a given floor, he gains Speed and Fire Rate for the rest of the floor, up to a maximum of +1.02 and +3.00, respectively.

name: Empty Heart
description: Complete the final chapter with Samson.

item.name: Empty Heart
item.description: If Isaac has one red heart or fewer at the beginning of a floor, he gains an empty red heart container.

name: Lil Abaddon
description: Complete the final chapter with Azazel.

item.name: Lil Abaddon
item.description: Spawns a familiar that charges a miniature Maw Of The Void attack while Isaac shoots.

item.name: Tinytoma
item.description: Gives Isaac a  Teratoma orbital that blocks shots, deals contact damage, and splits into smaller versions of itself upon taking damage. The smaller versions break into blue spiders.

name: Astral Projection
description: Complete the final chapter with Lazarus.

item.name: Astral Projection
item.description: Causes Isaac to turn into a ghost if he gets hit while in an uncleared room, giving him flight and spectral tears and blocking the next hit he takes.

name: Everything Jar
description: Complete the final chapter with Eden.

item.name: Everything Jar
item.description: Spawns certain pickups based on how many charges it has. If fully charged, instead has one of many unique effects.

name: Lost Soul
description: Complete the Corpse with the Lost.

item.name: Lost Soul
item.description: Creates a ghostly familiar that closely follows behind Isaac. It dies in one hit, but respawns at the start of the next floor. Each time it survives until the next floor, it rewards Isaac with  Soul Hearts,  Eternal Hearts, or an Item.

name: Hungry Soul
description: Complete the final chapter with the Lost.
unlock: Defeat The Beast as  The Lost

item.name: Hungry Soul
item.description: Enemies have a chance to spawn ghosts on death, which chase and deal contact damage to enemies and explode after a short time.

item.name: Blood Puppy
item.description: Spawns a familiar that chases enemies. After killing enough enemies, it becomes more powerful but will also try to hurt Isaac, it will also generate  Half Red Hearts on enemy kills. It can increase in power one more stage after killing even more enemies. Dealing enough damage to it returns it to normal.

name: C Section
description: Complete the final chapter with Lilith.

item.name: C Section
item.description: Replaces tears with fetuses that chase down enemies and deal contact damage. Each shot requires a brief charge up.

item.name: Keeper's Sack
item.description: Gives range, speed, or damage when buying things from a shop. Also spawns three coins and a  Key on pickup.

name: Keeper's Box
description: Complete the final chapter with Keeper.

item.name: Keeper's Box
item.description: Spawns a random shop item or pickup which can be bought for its normal price.

item.name: Lil Portal
item.description: A familiar that flies forward, consuming pickups in its path. Each one will increase its size and damage and spawn a Blue Fly. Every four pickups, it opens a portal that leads to an unexplored room.

name: Worm Friend
description: Complete the final chapter with Apollyon.

item.name: Worm Friend
item.description: Gives Isaac a  Nerve Ending familiar that burrows out of the ground to grab and deal damage to enemies over time.

name: Bone Spurs
description: Complete the Corpse with the Forgotten.

item.name: Bone Spurs
item.description: Enemies spawn floating bones on death, which block shots and damage/repel enemies that touch them.

name: Spirit Shackles
description: Complete the final chapter with the Forgotten.
unlock: Defeat The Beast as  The Forgotten

item.name: Spirit Shackles
item.description: On death, Isaac's ghost is chained to his dead body and he can continue to fight with 1/2 of a heart, returning to life after 10 seconds. After it activates, it must be recharged by picking up a  Soul Heart.

item.name: Revelation
item.description: Grants flight and two  Soul Hearts. In addition to tears, Isaac can charge up and fire a powerful holy laser.

name: Jar of Wisps
description: Complete the final chapter with Bethany.

item.name: Jar of Wisps
item.description: Spawns random wisps that shoot various tears, block shots, and deal contact damage. The number of wisps spawned increases every time the jar is used.

name: Magic Skin
description: Complete the Corpse with Jacob and Esau.
unlock: Defeat Mother as  Jacob and Esau

item.name: Magic Skin
item.description: Consumes one heart container or two  Soul Hearts to spawn an item and give Isaac a broken heart container that can never be filled. If Magic Skin isn't being held after being used, it is very likely to replace any future items.

name: Friend Finder
description: Complete the final chapter with Jacob and Esau.
unlock: Defeat The Beast as  Jacob and Esau

item.name: Friend Finder
item.description: Spawns a random friendly monster that mimics Isaac's movements and attacks.

name: The Broken
unlock: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as  Isaac

name: The Dauntless
unlock: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as  Magdalene

name: The Hoarder
unlock: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as  Cain

name: The Deceiver
unlock: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as  Judas

name: The Soiled
unlock: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as  ???

name: The Curdled
unlock: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as  Eve

name: The Savage
unlock: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as  Samson

name: The Benighted
unlock: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as  Azazel

name: The Enigma
unlock: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as  Lazarus

name: The Capricious
unlock: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as  Eden

name: The Baleful
unlock: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as  The Lost

name: The Harlot
unlock: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as  Lilith

name: The Miser
unlock: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as  Keeper

name: The Empty
unlock: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as  Apollyon

name: The Fettered
unlock: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as  The Forgotten

name: The Zealot
unlock: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as  Bethany

name: The Deserter
unlock: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as  Jacob and Esau

name: Glitched Crown
unlock: Defeat The Beast as  Tainted Isaac

item.name: Glitched Crown
item.description: Item pedestals cycle between 5 random items before being picked up.

name: Belly Jelly
unlock: Defeat The Beast as  Tainted Magdalene

item.name: Belly Jelly
item.description: Causes enemies to bounce off of Isaac, dealing damage to them if they hit an enemy or obstacle. Also gives Isaac the chance to deflect enemy shots.

name: Blue Key
unlock: Defeat The Beast as  Tainted Cain

name: Sanguine Bond
unlock: Defeat The Beast as  Tainted Judas

item.name: Sanguine Bond
item.description: Spawns a special set of spikes in the Devil Room. Taking damage from the spikes has a chance to grant a reward.

item.name: The Swarm
item.description: Spawns eight orbital flies, which turn into Blue Flies after they block a shot. Each time a room is cleared, spawns another orbital fly.

name: Heartbreak
unlock: Defeat The Beast as  Tainted Eve

item.name: Heartbreak
item.description: Grants 3 broken hearts and +0.25 damage for every broken heart Isaac has. Every otherwise fatal hit will add 2 more until Isaac has nothing but broken hearts.

name: Larynx
unlock: Defeat The Beast as  Tainted Samson

item.name: Larynx
item.description: Isaac shouts, damaging and pushing away nearby enemies. The shout gets stronger the more charges the item has. Larynx gains 1 charge whenever Isaac takes damage, in addition to charging normally.

name: Azazel's Rage
unlock: Defeat The Beast as  Tainted Azazel

item.name: Azazel's Rage
item.description: Isaac builds rage every time a room is cleared. After four rooms, fires a large Brimstone laser when entering the next room.

name: Salvation
unlock: Defeat The Beast as  Tainted Lazarus

item.name: Salvation
item.description: Gives Isaac a halo that summons beams of light on enemies inside it. The halo grows larger the more times Isaac has taken damage this floor.

name: TMTRAINER
unlock: Defeat The Beast as  Tainted Eden

item.name: TMTRAINER
item.description: Causes all future items to be "glitched", granting them completely random effects.

name: Sacred Orb
unlock: Defeat The Beast as  Tainted Lost

item.name: Sacred Orb
item.description: Prevents items of quality 0-1 from appearing, and items of quality 2 from appearing 33% of the time. Quest items are unaffected.

name: Twisted Pair
unlock: Defeat The Beast as  Tainted Lilith

item.name: Twisted Pair
item.description: Spawns two familiars that float on either side of Isaac and fire tears that use his tears, range, shot speed, and tear effects, and scale with damage.

name: Strawman
unlock: Defeat The Beast as  Tainted Keeper

item.name: Strawman
item.description: Spawns a controllable  Keeper to fight enemies alongside Isaac, functioning similarly to  Jacob and Esau. If Keeper dies, he spawns 5 blue spiders and Strawman is removed from Isaac's inventory.

name: Echo Chamber
unlock: Defeat The Beast as  Tainted Apollyon

item.name: Echo Chamber
item.description: When Isaac uses a Card, Pill, or Rune, he also uses a copy of the previous three Cards/Pills/Runes he used after picking up Echo Chamber.

name: Isaac's Tomb
unlock: Defeat The Beast as  Tainted Forgotten

item.name: Isaac's Tomb
item.description: Spawns an  Old Chest at the start of each floor.

name: Vengeful Spirit
unlock: Defeat The Beast as  Tainted Bethany

item.name: Vengeful Spirit
item.description: After taking damage, spawns an orbital wisp that lasts for the entire floor, up to a maximum of six. They fire tears but do not block shots.

name: Esau Jr.
unlock: Defeat The Beast as  Tainted Jacob

item.name: Esau Jr.
item.description: Swaps between the current character and Esau Jr., who has +2 flat damage and flight. Characters have independent items and health. Dying as either character ends the run.

name: Bloody Mary
unlock: Unlock  Bethany, Blood Bag, and It Lives!

name: Baptism by Fire
unlock: Defeat Satan as  Bethany, defeat Mom's Heart 11 times, and unlock Maggy's Faith

name: Pica Run
unlock: Defeat Mom's Heart 11 times and unlock Marbles

item.name: Dirty Mind
item.description: Destroying poop spawns Dip Familiars that follow Isaac and damage enemies. Destroying different types of poop spawns different Dips with special effects.

item.name: Purgatory
item.description: While in a room with enemies, spawns red cracks in the ground. Walking over these cracks summons ghosts that launch themselves at enemies and explode.

item.name: Spirit Sword
item.description: Instead of tears, Isaac swings a sword. Charging does a spin attack and fires a projectile, and a projectile is sometimes fired with normal swings if Isaac has no empty  Red Heart Containers.

name: Charged Penny
description: They will charge you up... for a small fee.
unlock: Donate to Battery Bums until they pay out with an item 5 times

name: The Fool
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greedier as  Tainted Lost

name: The Magician
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greedier as  Tainted Judas

name: The High Priestess
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greedier as  Tainted Lilith

name: The Empress
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greedier as  Tainted Eve

name: The Hierophant
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greedier as  Tainted Bethany

name: The Lovers
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greedier as  Tainted Magdalene

name: Wheel of Fortune
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greedier as  Tainted Cain

name: Strength
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greedier as  Tainted Samson

name: The Hanged Man
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greedier as  Tainted Keeper

name: Death
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greedier as  Tainted Forgotten

name: The Devil
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greedier as  Tainted Azazel

name: The Tower
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greedier as  Tainted Apollyon

name: The Stars
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greedier as  Tainted Isaac

name: The Sun and the Moon
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greedier as  Tainted Jacob

name: Judgement
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greedier as  Tainted Lazarus

name: The World
unlock: Defeat Ultra Greedier as  Tainted Eden

name: Brimstone Bombs
unlock: After breaking Hornfel's minecart, kill him before he can escape

item.name: Brimstone Bombs
item.description: +5  Bombs. Bombs fire four Brimstone lasers in the cardinal directions upon exploding.

name: Mega Mush
description: Beat everything in Hard Mode as every character.
unlock: Earn all Hard mode Completion Marks for all non-Tainted characters

item.name: Mega Mush
item.description: Gigantifies Isaac for 30 seconds, increasing damage and range while lowering tears, granting invulnerability, and allowing Isaac to crush enemies and obstacles he walks on. The effect persists between rooms.

name: Mom's Lock
unlock: Defeat Isaac, ???, Satan, and The Lamb as  Tainted Isaac

name: Holy Crown
unlock: Defeat Isaac, ???, Satan, and The Lamb as  Tainted Magdalene

name: Gilded Key
unlock: Defeat Isaac, ???, Satan, and The Lamb as  Tainted Cain

name: Your Soul
unlock: Defeat Isaac, ???, Satan, and The Lamb as  Tainted Judas

name: Dingle Berry
unlock: Defeat Isaac, ???, Satan, and The Lamb as  Tainted ???

name: Strange Key
unlock: Defeat Isaac, ???, Satan, and The Lamb as  Tainted Eve

name: Temporary Tattoo
unlock: Defeat Isaac, ???, Satan, and The Lamb as  Tainted Samson

name: Wicked Crown
unlock: Defeat Isaac, ???, Satan, and The Lamb as  Tainted Azazel

name: Torn Pocket
unlock: Defeat Isaac, ???, Satan, and The Lamb as  Tainted Lazarus

name: Nuh Uh!
unlock: Defeat Isaac, ???, Satan, and The Lamb as  Tainted Eden

name: Kid's Drawing
unlock: Defeat Isaac, ???, Satan, and The Lamb as  Tainted Lost

name: The Twins
unlock: Defeat Isaac, ???, Satan, and The Lamb as  Tainted Lilith

name: Keeper's Bargain
unlock: Defeat Isaac, ???, Satan, and The Lamb as  Tainted Keeper

name: Cricket Leg
unlock: Defeat Isaac, ???, Satan, and The Lamb as  Tainted Apollyon

name: Polished Bone
unlock: Defeat Isaac, ???, Satan, and The Lamb as  Tainted Forgotten

name: Expansion Pack
unlock: Defeat Isaac, ???, Satan, and The Lamb as  Tainted Bethany

name: RC Remote
unlock: Defeat Isaac, ???, Satan, and The Lamb as  Tainted Jacob

name: Member Card
description: Spend 40+ pennies in a single shop.
unlock: Spend 40+ coins in a single Shop

item.name: Member Card
item.description: Adds a trapdoor to every Shop that leads to a second shop with a unique stock and marked-up prices.

name: Golden Razor
description: Obtain 99 pennies. Then spend every single one of them.
unlock: In a single run, obtain 99 Coins, then spend all of them

item.name: Golden Razor
item.description: Spends five  Pennies to increase Isaac's damage by 1.2 for the current room.

item.name: Spindown Dice
item.description: Reduces the internal ID number of all items in the room by one, turning them into the item with that number.

item.name: Hypercoagulation
item.description: After Isaac takes damage from an enemy or donates health, launches  Red Hearts from Isaac that despawn after 1.5 seconds.

item.name: Bag of Crafting
item.description: Collects and holds up to 8 pickups, which can then be used to craft an item. The power level of the item is based on the quality of pickups used.

item.name: Dark Arts
item.description: Briefly grants +1 speed and makes Isaac invulnerable and intangible. When the effect ends, destroys all projectiles and damages all enemies Isaac ran through.

item.name: IBS
item.description: Causes Isaac to throw poop, create buffing creep, or drop bombs while fighting enemies.

item.name: Sumptorium
item.description: Removes half a heart and creates a Clot familiar that mimics Isaac's movements and tear effects. As  Tainted Eve, passively converts health into Clots while firing. Activating returns all Clots to health.

item.name: Berserk!
item.description: Isaac goes berserk for 5 seconds, greatly increasing his speed, tears, and damage, but restricting him to using a melee weapon instead of his tears. This item charges by dealing damage to enemies instead of clearing rooms.

item.name: Hemoptysis
item.description: Double-tapping a fire button causes Isaac to sneeze blood, dealing damage to enemies in front of him. Affected enemies are cursed and take more damage from Brimstone-like attacks.

item.name: Flip
item.description: Item pedestals have a second uninteractable "ghostly" item behind them. Activating will flip the real and ghostly items around. If playing as  Tainted Lazarus, also flips between them and  Dead Tainted Lazarus.

item.name: Ghost Bombs
item.description: +5  Bombs. Bombs become spectral and spawn ghosts that deal contact damage to enemies and explode after 10 seconds.

item.name: Gello
item.description: Spawns a demon familiar for the current room that's attached to Isaac and moves and fires in the direction Isaac shoots, using Isaac's damage, tears, range, shot speed, and special tear effects.

item.name: Keeper's Kin
item.description: Rocks and other Obstacles spawn blue spiders over time while in a room with enemies, and spawn two blue spiders when destroyed.

item.name: Abyss
item.description: Destroys all items in the room and gives Isaac a unique locust familiar for each item destroyed. Some items generate locusts with special effects.

item.name: Decap Attack
item.description: Throws Isaac's head, which is still able to fire tears at the spot it lands. Reactivating the item or stepping on the head reattaches it.

item.name: Lemegeton
item.description: Spawns a wisp representing a random passive item, which orbits Isaac but can be destroyed. While the wisp is alive, Isaac gains that item's effects. Generation uses the current room's item pool 25% of the time, otherwise a random pool.

item.name: Anima Sola
item.description: Chains down the nearest enemy for 5 seconds, preventing them from acting.

name: Death Certificate
unlock: Earn all Hard mode Completion Marks for all characters, including tainted ones

item.name: Death Certificate
item.description: Takes Isaac to an abandoned and expanded version of Home, which has one copy of every item in the game. After taking an item, Isaac returns to the room he used Death Certificate in.

name: Dead God
unlock: Unlock all the other achievements and collect every item in the game
